#summary Describes the Symbol class and its methods

=Symbol=
==Constructor==
{{{
Symbol(coord_x, coord_y)
}}}
where:
    _coord_x_ = x position of the box;

    _coord_y_ = y position of the box;

==Methods==
===Set===
sets the Symbol to a specific value.
{{{
set(value)
}}}
where:
    _value_ = new value of the Symbol;

===Get Value===
gets the value of the Symbol on Pd;
{{{
get_value()
}}}
